com.prc.alp.liaison.adminGUI
Class AdminTreeCellRenderer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JPanel
                          |
                          +--com.prc.alp.liaison.adminGUI.AdminTreeCellRenderer
public class AdminTreeCellRenderer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements javax.swing.tree.TreeCellRenderer

AdminTreeCellRender is the renderer for cells in both tree displays. For anybody digging into the code, please note that this originally used two labels in a panel, but only effectively uses one now.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1
See Also:
Serialized Form

Creates new TestTreeCellRenderer
Parameters:
app - Pointer to the LiaisonAdminToolController (application shell) that is creating it. This provides access to all public data structures.
disp - A displayModelServer that holds all of the icons and other resources needed for rendering.

                                                       int row,

The requiered method for a tree cell renderer. It displays the tree cell based on the semantics of either the ALP Society tree or external society tree.
